title: Amazon’s Revenue and Profit Jump, Reversing Slide
description: The company, which has had significant layoffs in recent months, is the latest Big Tech company to top Wall Street’s financial expectations.

title: Snap’s Sales Fall for First Time as a Public Company
description: As other tech companies returned to growth, Snap continued to struggle with advertising sales and lost money in the first quarter.

title: F.B.I. Searches Home of Top FTX Executive
description: Ryan Salame, a former top FTX executive and a prolific Republican donor, faces mounting legal pressure for his role in Sam Bankman-Fried’s business empire.

title: As Regulators Block Tech Deals, They Increasingly Look to the Future
description: British regulators cited the newness of the cloud gaming field to block Microsoft’s $69 billion acquisition of Activision, a shift in antitrust strategy.

title: Elon Musk Ramps Up A.I. Efforts, Even as He Warns of Dangers
description: The billionaire plans to compete with OpenAI, the ChatGPT developer he helped found, while calling out the potential harms of artificial intelligence.
